name: On the Hunt
description: A galaxy of duplicates makes a perfect hiding spot for criminals and other unsavory individuals. But could those tasked with tracking down the criminals pose an even greater threat?
rules:
-- There are two Phases to this Event! Each Phase is individually timed.
-- In this Hybrid Event, you will complete Faction Missions in one phase, and Supply Missions in another phase.
-- Unique Bajoran, Federation, and Hirogen Faction Missions are available during the event. Open the Event to access them.
-- Using any version of Boimler, Kago, Nayrok, Sarek, or STT Originals will provide a bonus to Faction Missions and Supply Missions.
-- Every Faction or Supply Mission you complete earns you Event Victory Points. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock Threshold Rewards!
-- Community Rewards are also available during Phase 2 only. Collect Event Victory Points to unlock these rewards before the phase change!
-- In this event, Squadrons may also compete to advance up the Squadron leaderboards. Join a Squadron to get more rewards!
bonus_text: Crew Bonus: Boimler, Kago, Nayrok, Sarek, or STT Originals
rewards_teaser: Reach Rank 1 by gaining Victory Points from Event Missions!

featured_crew.name: Tilly
featured_crew.flavor: In a timeline where she remained in the 23rd century, Tilly embraced her curiosity while working her way up to science officer.

featured_crew.name: Nayrok
featured_crew.flavor: Angosian Prime Minister whose attempt to join the Federation was halted not only by rebellion, but also by Nayrok's unwillingness to be open.

featured_crew.name: Sarek
featured_crew.flavor: Ambassador of Vulcan, he was the father of Spock.

rewards.name: Chronitons
rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.flavor: Chronitons allow your crew to take action in these chaotic times. Use Chronitons to replay parts of past missions via the Timeline.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Voyage Revival
rewards.flavor: Use to instantly revive a failed Voyage.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

rewards.name: Tilly
rewards.flavor: In a timeline where she remained in the 23rd century, Tilly embraced her curiosity while working her way up to science officer.

rewards.name: Sarek
rewards.flavor: Ambassador of Vulcan, he was the father of Spock.

rewards.name: Rarity
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: Skill
rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 6 Polestars: Command, Diplomacy, Security, Engineering, Science, Medicine

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.flavor: Contains ONE of the following 5 Polestars: Common, Uncommon, Rare, Super rare, Legendary

rewards.name: ISM
rewards.flavor: ISM, or interstellar medium, is the matter that exists between astronomical objects. It can be manipulated by the Q to facilitate crew retrieval. ISM can be obtained from Daily Log-in Rewards, Campaigns and participating in Fleet activities.

rewards.name: Dilithium
rewards.flavor: Dilithium is your most valuable asset. Use Dilithium in the Time Portal to acquire valuable crew members, items, and more.

rewards.name: Honor
rewards.flavor: Honor is gained by dismissing crew who have served you well, but are ready for reassignment. Redeem in the Time Portal for exclusive crew, special fusion-related items, training programs, and more.

rewards.name: Merits
rewards.flavor: Merits can be earned by completing missions. Use Merits to acquire faction-based rewards, upgrades to your ship, and more.

rewards.name: Training
rewards.flavor: Increases crew XP by 2500.

rewards.name: Tilly
rewards.flavor: In a timeline where she remained in the 23rd century, Tilly embraced her curiosity while working her way up to science officer.

adventures.name: Old Dog's Tricks
adventures.description: Uncover any secret routes or hideouts Kago-Darr might use.

adventures.name: Know Your Enemy
adventures.description: Dig up all the information on Kago you can.

rewards.name: On the Hunt
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

adventures.name: Scene of the Crime
adventures.description: Investigate the location Boimler and Nayrok were taken from.

adventures.name: Old Dog's Tricks
adventures.description: Uncover any secret routes or hideouts Kago-Darr might use.

rewards.name: On the Hunt
rewards.flavor: Event Victory Points

rewards.name: Sarek
rewards.flavor: Ambassador of Vulcan, he was the father of Spock.

rewards.name: Nayrok
rewards.flavor: Angosian Prime Minister whose attempt to join the Federation was halted not only by rebellion, but also by Nayrok's unwillingness to be open.

rewards.name: 10x Portal
rewards.flavor: 10 valuable items. Go to Time Portal to collect!

screens.text: "Ah, Captain, thank you for answering our hails. I trust you have this communication encrypted on your end? Please understand, this is a matter requiring strict confidentiality."

"As you are aware, the anomaly crisis has presented us an array of challenges. However, one we failed to anticipate was that, with so many versions of individuals present at the same time, some criminals are using the confusion and increased population as a cover for themselves."

"Which is why, as much as I know you don't want this, we must employ unconventional means. Fight fire with fire, as you humans say. Several of us have been hiring bounty hunters to track down the criminals we cannot. Though, not all of the hunters are responsive to directives."

"Especially after the last one you hired took the advance you gave him and disappeared into a w--uh, that look you're giving me is telling me I should shut up, huh? Well, uh, Captain, maybe you can help us find these criminals so we don't have to keep hiring shady bounty hunters."
"Ah, Captain, thank you for answering our hails. I trust you have this communication encrypted on your end? Please understand, this is a matter requiring strict confidentiality."

"As you are aware, the anomaly crisis has presented us an array of challenges. However, one we failed to anticipate was that, with so many versions of individuals present at the same time, some criminals are using the confusion and increased population as a cover for themselves."

"Which is why, as much as I know you don't want this, we must employ unconventional means. Fight fire with fire, as you humans say. Several of us have been hiring bounty hunters to track down the criminals we cannot. Though, not all of the hunters are responsive to directives."

"Especially after the last one you hired took the advance you gave him and disappeared into a w--uh, that look you're giving me is telling me I should shut up, huh? Well, uh, Captain, maybe you can help us find these criminals so we don't have to keep hiring shady bounty hunters."

"Shady, am I? And yet you were so eager to utilize my skills when you had 'criminals' to catch, only to deny me payment when I did as asked. If you refuse to make good on our contract, you will pay with your lives!"

"Captain, thank you for your assistance. However, as you heard, it would appear we have other pressing matters to attend to. Kago-Darr has taken Prime Minister Nayrok and Ensign Boimler and is holding them for ransom in lieu of payment he says he was owed.

responses.text: "Prime Minister, did Darr complete the services you hired him for? Why did you not pay him?"
"Is kidnapping your client really the best business strategy?"
"Can we have a 'pay one ransom, get the other one free' deal?"

screens.text: "I get Nayrok didn't pay you, but why am I here? I'm practically worthless! Just ask my commanding officer!"
"Captain, I am a political official being held for ransom. Is this really the time for you to be chastising me?"
"It is when my 'client' fails to pay me what I am owed. If you can cover it for him, Captain, I am happy to let him go."
"Captain! You're not saying you won't pay my ransom, are you? I've got a family and a transporter clone to think about! I'm a contributing member of Federation society!"
"For now, Captain, we would like you to rescue the Angosian Prime Minister and Ensign Boimler."

"Shady, am I? And yet you were so eager to utilize my skills when you had 'criminals' to catch, only to deny me payment when I did as asked. If you refuse to make good on our contract, you will pay with your lives!"

"Captain, thank you for your assistance. However, as you heard, it would appear we have other pressing matters to attend to. Kago-Darr has taken Prime Minister Nayrok and Ensign Boimler and is holding them for ransom in lieu of payment he says he was owed.

responses.text: "Prime Minister, did Darr complete the services you hired him for? Why did you not pay him?"
"Is kidnapping your client really the best business strategy?"
"Can we have a 'pay one ransom, get the other one free' deal?"

screens.text: "I get Nayrok didn't pay you, but why am I here? I'm practically worthless! Just ask my commanding officer!"
"Captain, I am a political official being held for ransom. Is this really the time for you to be chastising me?"
"It is when my 'client' fails to pay me what I am owed. If you can cover it for him, Captain, I am happy to let him go."
"Captain! You're not saying you won't pay my ransom, are you? I've got a family and a transporter clone to think about! I'm a contributing member of Federation society!"
"For now, Captain, we would like you to rescue the Angosian Prime Minister and Ensign Boimler."
